page.title: 11Kingsley Leisure Activities
page.content: There are many leisure activities for people living in and around Kingsley. For girls in Kingsley there are Brownies, Guides and Youth Club. Piano lessons are also available in the village. Girls have to travel to Cheadle for judo lessons. For boys in Kingsley there is the Youth Club. Football and piano lessons take place in Cheadle. For women in Kingsley there are WI and rounders, with darts matches at the Plough Inn, the Bulls Head, the Swan and the Railway Inn. For the men there are bowls, darts teams, pool and crib at the local inns. There is also a choir at Kingsley church. Badminton is played in the school on Monday evenings. Jogging is popular, and so is fishing in local ponds and the Caldon Canal.
